compound.description: Compound identifier: InChI, InChIKey, Name, UCI or Compound Source ID

sourceID.description: ID for the source assigned in UniChem when the type is "sourceID"

type.description: Type of compound representation, check the enum

searchedInchiPos.description: Position of the component inchi that this source matches

typeOfSearch.description: Type of connectivity search where this source was found, match: full inchi | searchedComponent: searched compound components, full inchi in DB | searchedComponentInComponents: searched components in DB components

compound.description: Compound representation string or compound ID on source (InChI, UCI, Compound Source ID)

searchComponents.description: When true searches connectivity using the given compoound plus its components in all the components of the compounds in the DB

sourceID.description: ID for the source assigned in Unichem when the type is "sourceID"

type.description: Type of compound representation, check the enum

standardinchi.description: InChI representation for the InChI Key provided

baseIDURLAvailable.description: If false the URL will contain only the ID on source

id.description: ID assign to the source DB in UniChEM

url.description: URL to the compound in the Source DB

UCICount.description: Total of compounds provided by that source

lastUpdated.description: Date in which the source database was last updated

name.description: Short name of the source database

nameLabel.description: machine readable label name of the source database

nameLong.description: Full name of the source database

sourceID.description: Unique ID for the source database

srcReleaseDate.description: Date in which the source database was released

srcReleaseNumber.description: Release number of the source database data stored in UniChEM

updateComments.description: Notes about the update process of that source to UniChEM

parameters.description: Search parameters, check the model for the available type options
parameters.name: body

200.description: A list of matched compounds and their assigned sources

post.description: Fetch multiple source data sets for a given compound with common connectivity to a given id on the database source, InChI, InChIkey or UCI

parameters.name: body
